DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to provide accurate, reliable information on schizophrenia clinical management in order to detect unmet medical needs of this disease in terms of: - Patient characteristics. - Diagnostic and treatment approaches: initial and subsequent.
DOC.criteria: Patients with schizophrenia Above 18 years Signed Informed consent Below 18 years Consent refused
DOC.keyword: Schizophrenic patients' social and health characteristics
